amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being used to waive or modify certain regulations covering civilian employees of the Department of Defense.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being used to waive or modify regulations promulgated under chapter 43, 71, 75, or 77 of title 5, United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Inslee amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 202 - 218 (Roll no. 283).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Inslee.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Inslee amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 202 - 218 (Roll no. 283).
